title: ESPN to Stop Broadcasting MLB Games After This Season as Commissioner Complains About ‘Minimal Coverage’
description: ESPN is taking one last swing at broadcasting Major League Baseball games — and then hanging up its cleats. The sports network will opt out of its TV contract with the MLB after this year, it announced on Thursday, ending a 35-year partnership with pro baseball. (The contract was set to run through 2028, but ESPN […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Harley Quinn Shocker: [Spoiler]’s Death Will Have ‘Unexpected’ Aftermath, Says Showrunner
description: The following contains spoilers from the Feb. 20 episode of Harley Quinn, now streaming on Max. This week on Max’s Harley Quinn, art imitated life for Frank the Plant, who capped his stage performance as Brainiac’s ill-fated sidekick Koko by keeling over himself, in front of a full house and with a bereft Ivy rushing […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: It’s a Renewalpalooza at CBS with Eight Scripted Series Secured for the 2025-26 Season!
description: CBS had a good time today renewing as much scripted content as they could muster. Find out if your show made the cut! The post It’s a Renewalpalooza at CBS with Eight Scripted Series Secured for the 2025-26 Season! appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Carissa Pavlica

title: 9-1-1: Nashville Ordered to Series as ABC Rubs Salt Into the Wound of Lone Star’s Demise
description: ABC has picked up 9-1-1: Nashville in the wake of 9-1-1: Lone Star's cancellation after five seasons. Is it a mistake? The post 9-1-1: Nashville Ordered to Series as ABC Rubs Salt Into the Wound of Lone Star’s Demise appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly
